code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import AlerContext from'../../context/alert/alertContext';export var Alerts=function Alerts(){var alertContext=useContext(AlerContext);var alerts=alertContext.alerts;return alerts.length>0&&alerts.map(function(alert){return React.createElement("div",{key:alert.id,className:"alert alert-".concat(alert.type)},React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-info-circle"})," ",alert.msg);});};export default Alerts;
